data.name: Master of the Forbidden Sea
data.detailed_description:
Using the legendary Compass of Destiny an artifact with the power to detect sunken treasure, the daring captain and crew of the S.S. Midnight seek to change the fortune of a cursed colony located in a chaotic region of the Pacific... known as the Triangle of Doom.

Confront the Unknown in a High Seas Adventure

The Forbidden Sea covers a vast area which requires nearly one year of in game time to explore. As you learn to navigate its many islands, you will encounter stranger and more dangerous monsters. Beware, your enemies will grow in strength and numbers as you do.


Dive to the Bottom

X marks the spot. Then your crew will be diving in deep. Use a deadly harpoon gun or clever swimming to save your life and unlock chests. Sea animals cannot be killed in this game, but they can be defeated.

Core Features

  • 24 Lost Treasure Chests
  • Strange Sea Monsters
  • Procedural Diving System
  • Purchase & Manage Resources
  • Build skill as your Captain levels up
  • Mysterious Undersea Realm
  • Amazing Soundtrack
  • Cloud Saves
  • Pixel Blood & Gore FX [optional]
  • Lovely Bar Wench to Dance with!

Follow, Wishlist, & Buy Now!



https://store.steampowered.com/app/1100070/Master_of_the_Forbidden_Sea/

data.short_description: Dive for treasure in a chaotic region of the Pacific known as the Triangle of Doom. Avoid starvation, battle strange monsters, and voyage past the point of no return to the undersea.
data.reviews:
“I had a ton of fun with this”
-Meatweasel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
